Feature.Name: Cloak of Elvenkind
Feature.Text: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

ResistanceFeature.Name: Piwafwi of Fire Resistance
ResistanceFeature.Text: You have resistance to fire damage while you wear this cloak.

MagicProperty.Name: Piwafwi of Fire Resistance
MagicProperty.Description: This is a cloak of elvenkind (see chapter 7, “Treasure”, of the Dungeon Master’s Guide). It also grants you resistance to fire damage while you wear it. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight for 1 hour without interruption.
